class.name: CollisionObject3D
class.description: CollisionObject3D is the base class for physics objects. It can hold any number of collision [Shape3D]s. Each shape must be assigned to a [i]shape owner[/i]. The CollisionObject3D can have any number of shape owners. Shape owners are not nodes and do not appear in the editor, but are accessible through code using the [code]shape_owner_*[/code] methods.

method.name: _input_event
method.description: Receives unhandled [InputEvent]s. [code]position[/code] is the location in world space of the mouse pointer on the surface of the shape with index [code]shape_idx[/code] and [code]normal[/code] is the normal vector of the surface at that point. Connect to the [signal input_event] signal to easily pick up these events.

method.name: create_shape_owner
method.description: Creates a new shape owner for the given object. Returns [code]owner_id[/code] of the new owner for future reference.

method.name: get_collision_layer_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member collision_layer] is enabled, given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: get_collision_mask_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member collision_mask] is enabled, given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: get_rid
method.description: Returns the object's [RID].

method.name: get_shape_owners
method.description: Returns an [Array] of [code]owner_id[/code] identifiers. You can use these ids in other methods that take [code]owner_id[/code] as an argument.

method.name: is_shape_owner_disabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the shape owner and its shapes are disabled.

method.name: remove_shape_owner
method.description: Removes the given shape owner.

method.name: set_collision_layer_value
method.description: Based on [code]value[/code], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member collision_layer], given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: set_collision_mask_value
method.description: Based on [code]value[/code], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member collision_mask], given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 32.

method.name: shape_find_owner
method.description: Returns the [code]owner_id[/code] of the given shape.

method.name: shape_owner_add_shape
method.description: Adds a [Shape3D] to the shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_clear_shapes
method.description: Removes all shapes from the shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_get_owner
method.description: Returns the parent object of the given shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_get_shape
method.description: Returns the [Shape3D] with the given id from the given shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_get_shape_count
method.description: Returns the number of shapes the given shape owner contains.

method.name: shape_owner_get_shape_index
method.description: Returns the child index of the [Shape3D] with the given id from the given shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_get_transform
method.description: Returns the shape owner's [Transform3D].

method.name: shape_owner_remove_shape
method.description: Removes a shape from the given shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_set_disabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code], disables the given shape owner.

method.name: shape_owner_set_transform
method.description: Sets the [Transform3D] of the given shape owner.

members.member: The physics layers this CollisionObject3D [b]is in[/b]. Collision objects can exist in one or more of 32 different layers. See also [member collision_mask]. [b]Note:[/b] Object A can detect a contact with object B only if object B is in any of the layers that object A scans. See [url=$DOCS_URL/tutorials/physics/physics_introduction.html#collision-layers-and-masks]Collision layers and masks[/url] in the documentation for more information.

The physics layers this CollisionObject3D [b]scans[/b]. Collision objects can scan one or more of 32 different layers. See also [member collision_layer]. [b]Note:[/b] Object A can detect a contact with object B only if object B is in any of the layers that object A scans. See [url=$DOCS_URL/tutorials/physics/physics_introduction.html#collision-layers-and-masks]Collision layers and masks[/url] in the documentation for more information.
Defines the behavior in physics when [member Node.process_mode] is set to [constant Node.PROCESS_MODE_DISABLED]. See [enum DisableMode] for more details about the different modes.
If [code]true[/code], the [CollisionObject3D] will continue to receive input events as the mouse is dragged across its shapes.

If [code]true[/code], this object is pickable. A pickable object can detect the mouse pointer entering/leaving, and if the mouse is inside it, report input events. Requires at least one [member collision_layer] bit to be set.

signal.name: input_event
signal.description: Emitted when the object receives an unhandled [InputEvent]. [code]position[/code] is the location in world space of the mouse pointer on the surface of the shape with index [code]shape_idx[/code] and [code]normal[/code] is the normal vector of the surface at that point.

signal.name: mouse_entered
signal.description: Emitted when the mouse pointer enters any of this object's shapes.

signal.name: mouse_exited
signal.description: Emitted when the mouse pointer exits all this object's shapes.

constants.constant: When [member Node.process_mode] is set to [constant Node.PROCESS_MODE_DISABLED], remove from the physics simulation to stop all physics interactions with this [CollisionObject3D]. Automatically re-added to the physics simulation when the [Node] is processed again.

When [member Node.process_mode] is set to [constant Node.PROCESS_MODE_DISABLED], make the body static. Doesn't affect [Area2D]. [PhysicsBody3D] can't be affected by forces or other bodies while static. Automatically set [PhysicsBody3D] back to its original mode when the [Node] is processed again.
When [member Node.process_mode] is set to [constant Node.PROCESS_MODE_DISABLED], do not affect the physics simulation.
